text: na#H prathaqmO$(1q)&nyO$&nyasmaiq druhyAqditiq tasmAqdyaH satA#nUnaptriNAM prathaqmO druhya#tiq sa ArtiqmArcCa#tiq yat tA#nUnaqptra(gm) sa#mavaqdyatiq BrAtRu#vyABiBUtyaiq Bava#tyAqtmanAq parA$&syaq BrAtRu#vyO Bavatiq pa~jcaq kRutvO&va#dyati pa~jcaqdhA hi tE tath sa#maqvAdyaqntAthOq pa~jcA$kSharA paq~gktiH pA~gktO# yaqj~jO yaqj~jamEqvAva# rundhaq Apa#tayE tvA gRuhNAqmItyA#ha prAqNO vA- [  ] 9
